Author: Chasee89
Text: A friend of mine once told me, when I was heavier, that I was about the same size as her sister; it made me so sad because I considered her chubby. Then I felt really bad for thinking that. Youâ€™re definitely not alone!

Author: Antique-Butterscotch
Text: So relatable, the judgy and mean part. I certainly judge myself too much, which is probably why I judge others a hell lot too. I feel the guilt sis.
